result.execSummary:
The defendant Randall S Kuhn was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Randall S Kuhn is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Randall S Kuhn was found guilty of Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Penalty-Theft if Value <=$2500], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Randall S Kuhn was found guilty of Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Randall S Kuhn in court, in custody with attorney Tristan F Eagon.  Christine Marie Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called 15CF274 & 15CF245.  In 15CF274 Amended complaint filed by ADA Genda.  Reading waived.  Rights/Elements.  Defendant pled no contest to 15CF274 and in 15CF245 defendant pled no contest to Cts. 2 & 3.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  In 15CF245 Ct. 1 Dismissed.  15CF274-Court sentenced defendant to serve 120 days in jail.  $443.00 costs.  103 days credit.  Time is considered served.  15CF245-Court sentenced defendant on Ct. 2 to pay $443.00 costs, and Ct. 3 $243.00 costs.  60 days to pay or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts.  Submit DNA sample.

Defendant Randall S Kuhn in court, in custody with attorney Adam Raabe.  Clifford Chase Burdon appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Raabe requesting new dates, bond cont'd  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 03:50 pm.  Return date scheduled for October 27, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
For Leave to File Additional Motions filed by Atty Burdon for Atty Cross
and Notice of DNA and Witness List filed by Atty Burdon for Atty Cross

records.addlTxt: from Atty Clifford for Atty Cross re: discovery material

Defendant Randall S Kuhn in court, in custody with attorney Adam Raabe.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called: 15CF245 & 15CF274.  Atty Raabe new to case.  Requested new dates.  New dates have been set already in Br. 3.
Motion for Preservation of Evidence filed by Adam Raabe
For Leave to File Additional Motions filed by Adam Raabe
standard felony conditions, absolute sobriety, not go on premises where alcohol is sold for onsight consumption, defendant to submit DNA Sample

Defendant Randall S Kuhn in court, in custody by video with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Christine M. Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin. waives reading of complaint, right to atty recited, $2,000.00 sign bond, standard felony conditions, absolute sobriety, not go on premises where alcohol is sold for onsight consumption, defendant to submit DNA Sample, waives time limits to prelim,  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 20, 2015 at 03:50 pm.  Return date scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
